title: Black Love
lyrics:
Seems to me we've reach that special day
My breathing is slowed when I'm around you I can't help it
Feeling bliss, so pure
I know it feels like you can't put in words
That ring, it sings to me a golden tune
It glistens and shine to show the world our love is true

Today I see sound

I know it to be true our colours blend



Dah dah dah, dah dah dah dah dah dah

Dah dah dah dah dah dah dah dah dah dah dah dah dah

Dah dah dah dah dah, dah dah dah dah dah dah dah dah dah dah



Your dress it brings me to a time of class

You're so elegant, your skin it's shining melanin

We are king and queen

I see the next one thousand years with you

The smile worn by both our families

They can see the power in our new found unity

One day we'll create addition in the imagess of we



Dah dah dah, dah dah dah dah dah dah

Dah dah dah dah dah dah dah dah dah dah dah dah dah

Dah dah dah dah dah, dah dah dah dah dah dah dah dah dah dah





Dah dah dah, dah dah dah dah dah dah

Dah dah dah dah dah dah dah dah dah dah dah dah dah

Dah dah dah dah dah, dah dah dah dah dah dah dah dah dah dah
